desc: Buy your vending machines from Allied Vending™ and enjoy savings of up to 30% off MSRP during our annual sales event. Qualified shoppers can finance our vending machines for $0 down and payments starting at under $99 per month. Our vending machine sales event ends soon, so place your order soon.

layout.text: Huge selection of snack, soda & combo vending machines! Get up to 30% off + Free Shipping until Midnight of May 8 on all vending machines during our Huge Mother's Day Sales Event!
